name: zPoeTrade
description:
Changes the looks of the popular (third party) Path of Exile item-trading website poe.trade with a purple-colored theme.
You must switch to the Dark theme on the website for this style to look correct!

user.name: Zyn
user.about: Swedish. Fat. Dumb. That's about it.

additional_info: 2017-04-09 - Updated looks on currency items on currency.poe.trade, because of the new additions of dropdowns for essences, maps and cards. Screenshot updated for this too (Ctrl+F5 to refresh cache). 2017-03-19 - Added colors to item calculations in search listings (eDPS, Armor, etc). Initial Release - To do: Color and style Tiles layout on search listings ... maybe, I don't know many that use tiles instead of list layout. - To do: CSS to be cleaned up and improved. Basically hamfisted this!
